title: Friendly Improved Mutations
description:
Just removes a few things from the mod Improved Mutations by Eboreg so that it will play nice with other popular mutation mods.

Removed:
Flaming Ray/Freezing Ray, Poisonous Fangs, Scales, Snake Tail (and Constricted), and Thick Fur.

Tested with:
WM Expanded Mutations, Friendly Graven's Mutation Mod, Miscellaneous Mutations, Poison/Paralysis/Confusing Fangs Mutations, Underdark Mutation

Do not use with the original unless you like crashes. All credit goes to the original mod author.
author: Eboreg, edited by: hydnplynsyt
